div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 06:53 am CDT

div.div: A 50 percent chance of showers, mainly between 8am and 5pm. Cloudy, with a high near 58. Windy, with a north wind 20 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.

Mostly cloudy during the early evening, then gradual clearing, with a low around 44. Breezy, with a north wind 20 to 25 mph decreasing to 10 to 15 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 68. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

h3.strong: ! Based on guidance from the Governor, Tri-County is now closed for the rest of the 19-20 school year.
